North Shore Hospital patient request to avoid Asian staff: We cannot put up with racial intolerance in our health system - Dr Nina Su https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/north-shore-hospital-eptic-request-to-avoid-asian-staff-we-cannot-tolerate-racial-intolerance-in-our-health-system-尼娜博士/PCQTUBCRKFFWDOX5QDSLNBUWQY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/north-shore-hospital-eptic-request-to-avoid-asian-staff-we-cannot-tolerate-racial-intolerance-in-our-health-system-尼娜博士/PCQTUBCRKFFWDOX5QDSLNBUWQY/ Dr Nina SuOPINION: This is patronising, condescending ... an infringement on basic human rights. Photo / 123rf
